mapper.insert: insert into morningclockin (Clockin_time, Clockin_ip, Clockin_stuid, Clockin_stuschool, Clockin_code, Clockin_succeed, longitude, latitude) values (#{clockinTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clockinIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockinStuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockinStuschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockinSucceed,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL})

insert into morningclockin
Clockin_time,
Clockin_ip,
Clockin_stuid,
Clockin_stuschool,
Clockin_code,
Clockin_succeed,
longitude,
latitude,

mapper.select: select * from morningclockin where Clockin_stuid = #{clockin_stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Clockin_stuschool = #{clockin_stuschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Clockin_succeed = #{succeed,jdbcType=SMALLINT} order by Clockin_time DESC limit 1
